body_html:
This started popping up for us at the end of last week; what solved it was replacing
ENV PATH /opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py$PYTHON_VERSION/bin:$PATH
with
ENV PATH /opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py$PYTHON_VERSION/bin:/opt/conda/bin/:$PATH
since the conda bug is about a conda executable no longer being present in the environment bindir. This might be worth changing if it's likely that the buggy conda will keep showing up? Any idea if it breaks anything else? @soumith
